Description: Blue glazed composition (faience) bowl; globular-biconical body on a low ring base; four small perforated handles on shoulder at regular intervals around the vase.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Luigi Palma di Cesnola (?)
Field Collection by: Alessandro Palma di Cesnola (?)
Curator's comments: 'Aradippo, Cyprus' is written in black ink on the base.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Luigi Palma di Cesnola
